author: ehillenius
msg: setModel was called from the constructor. Very wrong. If people want to do extra stuff with the model they get passed in in the constructor, they can do it just there, in the constructor. Overriding setModel - in those really rare cases that is needed should have the semantics of providing custom behavior when clients explicitly call setModel, not from within the component

author: ehillenius
msg: add label and editor after construction to avoid initialization problems
